github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Implemented initial Core features - needs more testing
github_commits.lessons_learned: Query works fine with small data, but performance degrades with larger datasets.  Need to investigate indexing.
github_commits.bug_related: This commit directly addresses the issue of performance with large data.  Further investigation needed to optimize queries.
github_commits.bug_stage: Query works fine with small data

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Core features pe kaam karna hai, lekin speed toh achcha hona chahiye.  Kya kar rahe ho?

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Data flow ko check kar rahi hoon.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and see if we can optimize.  Query speed is important.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  If data grows, it will slow down everything.  Just checking!

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  We'll monitor the performance closely.  Indexing is key!

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Prioritize Core features with optimized performance, focusing on indexing.
slack_conversations.warnings: Potential performance issues with large datasets - need to monitor and optimize queries.  'Query works fine with small data' is a critical concern.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Neha's concern about production impact and Rahul's suggestion about indexing strongly suggest a performance bottleneck related to 'Query works fine with small data'.
slack_conversations.bug_stage: Query works fine with small data

jira_tickets.title: Implement Core features - Performance Focus
jira_tickets.description: Develop the Core features, with a strong emphasis on performance and scalability.  Initial implementation is complete; testing and performance monitoring are critical.  Address potential issues related to large datasets.
comments: Initial implementation complete.  Need to thoroughly test performance with different data volumes.
Testing with small datasets shows good performance.  Larger datasets need investigation.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly related to the performance issue flagged during testing - 'Query works fine with small data' is the root cause.
jira_tickets.bug_stage: Query works fine with small data

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Core Features - Performance Considerations
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Core features, including architecture diagrams and code snippets.  Highlights the importance of data indexing and query optimization.  Addresses potential performance bottlenecks related to large datasets. Includes recommendations for monitoring query execution times.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
best_practices: Use appropriate indexes for frequently queried columns.
Consider caching strategies for frequently accessed data.
common_mistakes: Not using indexes on large datasets.
confluence_docs.bug_stage: Query works fine with small data

google_docs.title: Sprint 2 Planning - Core Features - Speed!
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from Sprint 2 planning.  Discussions centered around the Core features implementation and the performance challenges.  Action items assigned to investigate query optimization and data indexing.
action_items: Sneha: Update documentation with performance considerations.
decisions_made: Prioritize Core features with a focus on performance.
google_docs.bug_mentions: The issue of 'Query works fine with small data' was a key topic of discussion.  Requires immediate attention.
google_docs.bug_stage: Query works fine with small data
